EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Sounds good thanks! From: Joan Trant [mailto:joantrant@gmail.com] Sent: Wednesday, June 20, 2012 10:12 AM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: Finishing up your enrollment - last step! Hi, Sara. I was on the road until Mon night. Will coplete paperwork and send it in between today and tomorrow. Thanks for your help!On Fri, Jun 15, 2012 at 3:52 PM, Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> wrote:Hi Joan, Great news I have the contract from the client (attched.) The last step is sending me a copy of your completed I-9. You can find the I-9 form in your enrollment documents; you will sign/date section 1 and a local notary will sign/date section 2 ( there will be instructions on how to complete this form in your enrollment documents as well.) You can send this back to me via email (I don’t need a hard copy.) I will also need you to send me a copy of your US passport (you can just take a picture with your phone and email that to me.) Please feel free to reach out to me with any questions. Thanks!Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028 <tel:703.793.6028>f: 703.793.6068 <tel:703.793.6068>e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcV5Yu1Nk6vKNAq7gnjzMNJunttYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcV5Yu1Nk6vKNAq7gnjzMNJunttYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcV5Yu1Nk6vKNAq7gnjzMNJunttYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
-- Joan M +1 917 763 6361
